name: The Daydream River -trial version
description:
■ Plot Summary

One day before the summer vacation, a dead body of one male student named Sasaki was found in a middle school. While all students were mourning over the death, his classmate Hatazaki noticed that Sasaki called him on a phone at midnight.

The answering machine recorded a miserable voice message until he had been dead. Hatazaki and his friend Isawa wondered what happened at their school at midnight.
In response to this, they decided to sneak in the school to clear up his regrets.
And from the death of one boy, children are going to get caught up in a big conspiracy.

■ Genre
Modern science fiction, long horror RPG game.

■ Estimated time to clear
1, 2 hours

■ Warning
This video game is for 15 and older.
As it contains threatening expression and grotesque contents partly, please refrain from playing if you have a weak heart.
The author is not responsible for any troubles caused during playing the game.
*You need to install RPG Maker VX Ace RTP when you play this game.
(Link to install : http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages)
